issue.title: jest-dom extend-expect
issue.description: Hi, love this library!  just wondering if your planning to get the jest-dom/extend-expect functions converted to Native?

payload.title: Better Code Hub
payload.headline: Spend less time fixing bugs. And more time shipping new features.
payload.description: A clean codebase keeps development velocity high & makes contributing easy. Better Code Hub indicates just the right amount of refactoring needed to keep it compliant.Better Code Hub checks your code for compliance against 10 benchmarked software engineering guidelines. It gives immediate feedback on where to focus for quality improvements. 17 modern programming languages are supported. Up to 700,000 lines of code
